Regulation Name(s): Multipurpose System for In Vitro Coagulation Studies
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Actalyke Activated Clotting Time test systems
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Actalyke QC Kits AQC-HP and AQC-LP as quality control for Actalyke Activated Clotting Time test systems
Indications for Use Summary: Used to perform quality control assays with Actalyke Activated Clotting Time test systems when monitoring heparinized patients undergoing ECMO, renal dialysis, or cardiovascular procedures
